Sense: in some place | to some place

English: sometime, someday, some day, one day
Sense: at an indefinite but stated time in the past or future | sometime; at some time in the future | – | at unspecified time in the future
in one way or another; in some way not yet known or designated | –
possessive case of ''someone'' | belonging to somebody (possessive form of ''somebody'') | –
